title: Pura Vida Costa Rica Cool Distressed Ocean Beach T-Shirt!
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
Pura Vida Costa Rica Distressed T-Shirt is a beautiful classic surf-style design with the sun, wave and palm tree. Show off your Pura Vida "Pure Life" Lifestyle with this stylish vintage tee!

This cool shirt makes a great Christmas and/or Birthday gift for friends, family, loved ones, yourself and those who love the beauty of Costa Rica's Central American beaches and want to share the stoke with others! Great to wear on your travels or at home!
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
